trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for text-based XML messages.
trans-unit.target: 表示組態項目，指定的字元編碼和訊息版本處理，用於以文字為基礎的 XML 訊息。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The text encoder creates text-based messages on the wire.
trans-unit.target: 文字編碼器會在網路上建立以文字為基礎的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Messages produced by this encoder are suitable for WS-* based interoperability. Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. The text encoder specified by this configuration section creates text-based messages on the wire. Messages produced by this encoder are suitable for WS-* based interoperability.
trans-unit.target: 此編碼器產生的訊息適合 WS-*型的互通性。 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。 指定這個組態區段的文字編碼器會在網路上建立以文字為基礎的訊息。此編碼器產生的訊息適合 WS-*型的互通性。

trans-unit.source: Web service or Web service client can generally understand textual XML.
trans-unit.target: Web 服務或 Web 服務用戶端通常可以瞭解文字 XML。

trans-unit.source: However, transmitting large blocks of binary data as text is the least efficient method for encoding XML messages.
trans-unit.target: 不過，將大型二進位資料區塊當做文字來傳輸是效率最差的方法，針對 XML 訊息進行編碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BinaryMessageEncodingElement> class represents the configuration element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for binary-based XML messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BinaryMessageEncodingElement>類別表示組態項目，指定的字元編碼和訊息版本處理，用於二進位 XML 訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BinaryMessageEncodingElement>

trans-unit.source: This is most efficient but least interoperable of the encoding options.
trans-unit.target: 這是最有效率、 但最互通的編碼選項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MtomMessageEncodingElement> class represents the configuration element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning used for a message using a Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) encoding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MtomMessageEncodingElement>類別表示組態項目，指定的字元編碼和訊息版本處理，用於使用訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM) 編碼的訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MtomMessageEncodingElement>

trans-unit.source: MTOM is an efficient technology for transmitting binary data in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] messages.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 是中傳輸二進位資料中的有效技術[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]訊息。

trans-unit.source: The MTOM encoder attempts to strike a balance between efficiency and interoperability.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 編碼器會嘗試在效率和互通性之間達成平衡。

trans-unit.source: The MTOM encoding transmits most XML in textual form, but optimizes large blocks of binary data by transmitting them as-is, without conversion to text.
trans-unit.target: MTOM 編碼會傳輸大部分的 XML，以文字格式，但是藉由將它們做為傳輸的最佳化大型二進位資料區塊的是，不轉換成文字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TextMessageEncodingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TextMessageEncodingElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 指定的繫結項目的內容套用至這個繫結組態區段。

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
trans-unit.target: 繫結項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Type>這個組態項目的。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>這個組態項目的。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration section to this element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的組態區段的內容複製到這個項目。

trans-unit.source: The configuration section to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的組態區段。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of messages that can be read simultaneously without allocating new readers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定可以同時讀取，而不需配置新讀取器的訊息數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Larger pool sizes make the system more tolerant to activity spikes at the cost of a larger working set.
trans-unit.target: 較大的集區大小可讓系統容許更多活動失效，但會耗用較大的工作集。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of messages that can be read simultaneously without allocating new readers.
trans-unit.target: 可以同時讀取，而不需配置新讀取器的訊息數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 64.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 64。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of messages that can be sent simultaneously without allocating new writers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定可以同時傳送，而不需配置新寫入器的訊息數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Larger pool sizes make the system more tolerant to activity spikes at the cost of a larger working set.
trans-unit.target: 較大的集區大小可讓系統容許更多活動失效，但會耗用較大的工作集。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of messages that can be sent simultaneously without allocating new writers.
trans-unit.target: 可以同時傳送，而不需配置新寫入器的訊息數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 16.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 16。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SOAP and WS-Addressing versions that are used to format the text message sent using this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於格式化使用此繫結傳送的文字訊息的 SOAP 和 Ws-addressing 版本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion> value that specifies the SOAP version of the messages sent using this binding.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>值，指定使用這個繫結所傳送訊息的 SOAP 版本。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Soap12WSAddressing10*>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Soap12WSAddressing10*>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageVersion.Soap12WSAddressing10*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of SOAP messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可由以此繫結設定的端點處理的 SOAP 訊息複雜性的條件約束。

trans-unit.source: The complexity constraints include items like a maximum element depth, or a maximum length for string content within the message.
trans-unit.target: 複雜性條件約束包含最大項目深度，或是訊息內的字串內容的最大長度等項目。

trans-unit.source: The constraints protect against a type of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources.
trans-unit.target: 條件約束會防止的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊會嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas> that specifies the complexity constraints.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas>指定複雜性條件約束。</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要繫結上發出訊息時使用的字元集編碼方式的字元。

trans-unit.source: When specifying a content type such as “utf-16” an XML declaration is required in the message.
trans-unit.target: 當指定的內容類型，例如"utf-16"XML 宣告需要訊息中。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can specify either “utf-16LE” or “utf-16BE” and an XML declaration is not required.
trans-unit.target: 或者您可以指定"utf&16;LE"或"utf&16;BE"並不需要 XML 宣告。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.Text.Encoding> value that specifies the character set encoding to be used for emitting messages on the binding.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref:System.Text.Encoding>使用繫結上發出訊息的編碼方式設定值，指定的字元。</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>.</xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>
